step05.title: Container & soil
step05.subtitle: These details are optional. Choose the pot/container material and soil or potting mix — or leave them as “Not specified” and continue.
step05.notSpecifiedDesc: Skip this if you’re not sure.

plastic.label: Plastic
plastic.description: Lightweight, retains moisture longer; inexpensive and versatile.

ceramic.label: Ceramic (glazed)
ceramic.description: Heavier; retains moisture; decorative glazed finish.

terracotta.label: Terracotta
terracotta.description: Porous clay; wicks moisture; great for succulents/cacti.

clay.label: Clay (unglazed)
clay.description: Similar to terracotta; breathable, faster drying.

cement.label: Cement
cement.description: Very heavy; modern look; retains moisture quite well.

concrete.label: Concrete
concrete.description: Durable and heavy; stable outdoors; retains moisture.

metal.label: Metal (generic)
metal.description: Can heat quickly in sun; usually needs inner liner/pot.

stainless.label: Stainless steel
stainless.description: Modern look; corrosion-resistant; may heat up in sun.

aluminum.label: Aluminum
aluminum.description: Light, conductive; watch for overheating in bright sun.

iron.label: Iron / steel
iron.description: Very durable; can rust; may require liners.

copper.label: Copper / brass
copper.description: Decorative; may react with soil; typically as a cachepot.

wood.label: Wood
wood.description: Natural look; may need liner; can rot if constantly wet.

bamboo.label: Bamboo
bamboo.description: Light, sustainable; usually lined; indoor use preferred.

rattan.label: Rattan / wicker
rattan.description: Decorative cachepots; use a plastic nursery pot inside.

glass.label: Glass
glass.description: Great for terrariums; no drainage; watch moisture.

stone.label: Stone / marble
stone.description: Very heavy and stable; retains cool temperature.

resin.label: Resin
resin.description: Lightweight, durable; good outdoor choice; insulates roots.

fiberglass.label: Fiberglass
fiberglass.description: Light, strong; outdoor friendly; good insulation.

biodegradable.label: Biodegradable
biodegradable.description: Coconut coir, peat, etc.; starter pots; decompose over time.

fabric.label: Fabric planter
fabric.description: Air-prunes roots; fast drying; good for vegetables.

grow-bag.label: Grow bag
grow-bag.description: Fabric bag; portable; drains fast; needs frequent watering.

self-watering.label: Self-watering
self-watering.description: Reservoir with wicking; evens out watering schedule.

all-purpose.label: All-purpose potting mix
all-purpose.description: A good default for most houseplants.

cactus-succulent.label: Cactus / succulent mix
cactus-succulent.description: Fast-draining; ideal for succulents and cacti.

orchid.label: Orchid mix
orchid.description: Chunky bark-based mix for air flow around roots.

aroid.label: Aroid mix
aroid.description: Very airy mix (bark/perlite) for aroids like Monstera/Philodendron.

seed-starting.label: Seed-starting mix
seed-starting.description: Fine texture; good for propagation and seedlings.

bonsai.label: Bonsai mix
bonsai.description: Gritty, well-draining mix that resists compaction.

peat-free.label: Peat-free mix
peat-free.description: More sustainable option; composition varies by brand.
